articles.author: Tim Ross
articles.title: Has Brexit finally paid off? What Trump’s tariff reprieve means for Starmer - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The U.S. president hinted he’ll spare Britain from his trade war, while hammering the EU. But as Nigel Farage surges in the polls, Keir Starmer isn’t safe from Brexit yet.
articles.content:
And Nigel Farage, the godfather of Brexit, is waiting eagerly to take over.
A poll from YouGov on Tuesday put Farages Reform UK ahead of Labour, in first place nationally for the first time. Polling… [+1611 chars]

articles.author: David Phelan
articles.title: Hot Tub Is 1st iPhone Porn App: Apple Warns Of User Safety In Rare Statement - Forbes
articles.description: It’s almost unheard of for Apple to comment on an individual iPhone app, but it’s just done so in response to the first porn app, just arriving on European iPhones.
articles.content: Apple has been consistent in not allowing pornography into the App Store. But changes in the EU have allowed independent app stores to arrive and these have their own views on whats permissible. So, … [+2344 chars]
